description.displayText:
Wasi worked with a team of agency care givers who provided 24/7 care with one of my clients (client was an elder adult of whom I was the legal guardian). Wasi was professional, respectful and punctual. He did everything that was requested of him in providing the best care for the client. My client enjoyed Wasi's company. Wasi was patient, encouraging and always pleasant with my client. 
When my client moved from home to a residential community, Wasi was chosen to continue with my client during the transition. He was instrumental in facilitating that transition, helping my client be "at home" in his new residence.

Wasi was patient, encouraging and always pleasant with my client.
